statements: SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY dietary_preferences DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, dietary_preferences FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE dietary_preferences = 'vegetarian';
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE dietary_preferences = 'gluten-free' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE dietary_preferences = 'vegetarian';
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE dietary_preferences = 'vegan' AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, dietary_preferences FROM recipes WHERE dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian' AND ingredients LIKE '%tomato%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recipes FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, username FROM recipes JOIN users ON recipes.recipe_id = users.user_id WHERE users.dietary_preferences = 'Vegan';
SELECT recipe_name, username, email FROM recipes JOIN users ON recipes.recipe_id = users.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine, cooking_time FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, serving_size, cuisine FROM recipes WHERE serving_size > 4 AND cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT recipe_name, instructions, difficulty_level FROM recipes WHERE serving_size < 4 AND cuisine = 'Mediterranean' ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC;
SELECT ingredient_name, category, calories FROM ingredients WHERE protein > 10 AND fat < 5 ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, serving_size, cooking_time FROM recipes ORDER BY cooking_time DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Easy';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine, serving_size FROM recipes WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' OR cuisine = 'Mexican';
SELECT ingredient_name, category, calories FROM ingredients ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions, cuisine, serving_size FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id WHERE amount > 0.5;
SELECT id, recipe_name, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients;
SELECT user_id, dietary_preference FROM preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_ingredients WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id = 2;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredients WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, dietary_preference FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_ingredients WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE id = 2 AND recipe_name LIKE '%Chicken%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM Recipes;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM Recipe_Ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 'abc123';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM Recipes r JOIN Recipe_Ingredients ri ON r.recipe_id = ri.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_name, diet_name FROM Recipes R JOIN Recipe_Dietary_Preferences RD ON R.recipe_id = RD.recipe_id JOIN Dietary_Preferences D ON RD.diet_id = D.diet_id;
SELECT * FROM Ingredients WHERE ingredient_name = 'Flour';
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM Recipe_Ingredients WHERE recipe_id = '54321-09876' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT recipe_name FROM Recipes JOIN Recipe_Dietary_Preferences ON Recipes.recipe_id = Recipe_Dietary_Preferences.recipe_id WHERE diet_id = '98765-43210';
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Cake%' AND recipe_description IS NOT NULL AND recipe_id IN (SELECT recipe_id FROM Recipe_Dietary_Preferences WHERE diet_id = '12345-67890');
